The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Dynamic Content

Also known as: Live Content

Content that is dynamically pulled into an email in order to create a more personalized experience. Can be driven through code at send time or after a send via URL manipulation, content injection, or images.

Additional Resources

  • What is dynamic content in email marketing?, Campaign Monitor
  • What is dynamic content in email marketing?, ActiveCampaign
  • How to Use Live Dynamic Email Content to Increase Engagement, Litmus
  • The Ultimate Guide to Dynamic Content in Email, Litmus
